Container.Name: E-NOTE-ION
Container.Overview: E•NOTE•ION is a cron-based content scheduler for Vestaboard split-flap displays. Supports both the Note (3×15) and Flagship (6×22). Content is defined in JSON files and displayed on a schedule with priority queueing.

Config.Name: Vestaboard API Key
Config.Description: Your Vestaboard Read/Write API key. Found in the Vestaboard app under Settings.

Config.Name: Content directory
Config.Description: Optional. Path to a directory of content JSON files on the host. If left blank, the bundled sample content runs automatically. Mount your own directory here to use custom templates instead.

Config.Name: Flagship mode
Config.Description: Set to true to target a Vestaboard Flagship (6x22) instead of a Note (3x15).

Config.Name: Public mode
Config.Description: Set to true to only show templates marked public: true. Useful when the display is in a shared or guest-visible space.
